name: Catcher 11
description:
Catcher 11

A fun arcade game where you try to catch a goose or something else bevore it falls to the floor.

you have 3 lives and you lose one if the goose falls to the floor.

and you get one or more points when catching the goose.

Soundtrack

the soundtrack of Catcher 11 is free to use for anyone who wants to use it (:

Controls

Movestart gamereset gameleft,right arrow keysspacebarenter

Why did i make Catcher 11?

I wanted a challenge, and i found i never made a game like this one and i also never made a game in only 2h, tho i took 1h to code it and 1h to make art and music.

And a second reason is that i basicly played that game in real life with baloons by punching them into the air and counting how often i did manage to keep it away from the floor.
